title: Forget Yourself
description: "It is important that you know: I love you.Of course I have no idea who you are.But I have no real idea who I am either, so it seems fair to me."Blondee lives in a world without memories: just four walls, fifty huts and a hundred forgotten people. She came in with the food rations. Mind and body naked, like everyone. Now she lives in a triangular hut at the edge of everything. They say she was a thief — she has long fingers — and she certainly has a reputation for taking multiple lovers. But haunted by the ghost of a fat man and dreaming of a stone woman, Blondee knows she can reshape the world — she just needs to get the world to listen…
author: Redfern Jon Barrett
